overview: Before first joining DAG in 2002, Kendra was a principal at Alta Communications, a private equity firm specializing in media and wireless communication investments. Prior to Alta, Kendra worked at Brown Brothers Harriman, where she evaluated investments on behalf of the 1818 Funds, which included private equity and mezzanine funds focused on a wide range of investments. She also worked at Steamboat Ventures, the venture capital arm of the Walt Disney Company. Kendra received a BA from Harvard College and an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business.
